title: New: Unmap – Good Love
body:
Now that the debris of the Jai Paul fiasco is beginning to settle, and we’re still no closer to the real truth, it’s back to posting about more than just XL signed artists.

New Zealand’s Unmap deserves to divert at least some of the attention away from Paul, and as a Souncloud commenter states, ‘I hope you’re demoing this stuff to labels like R&S’. It has that slick, hypnotic R&B sound, with the overproduction on the vocals actually working in a slightly bizarre manner. Check out Good Love below.
